channel.title: Tenori On on pika.blue
channel.description: Recent content in Tenori On on pika.blue

item.title: Releases
item.description: This page contains a link to the releases so far.

item.title: Splits
item.description: This function extends all layer modes with octave, velocity, note length, pan, probabilistic, offbeat, sharp/flat, sustain and portamento splits.

item.title: Effects (reverb, chorus)
item.description: This feature unlocks some marginally different effects already in the TNR.

item.title: Layer Meta Controllers
item.description: This function introduces a number of layer meta controllers : Velocity, Pan, Volume, Sound length, Chorus amount, Reverb amount, Probability

item.title: Life layer type
item.description: This function combines Conway’s Game of Life to a score mode.

item.title: Rain layer type
item.description: This function adds a new genuinely probabilistic layer type, called Rain.

item.title: Responses to MIDI CC messages
item.description: This feature increases the number of MIDI CC message types that are recognised by the TNR.

item.title: Score X : Extended score
item.description: This function adds a new layer type - a score mode that groups the normal 16 blocks of 16 steps differently, allowing up to 1 section of 256 steps.

item.title: Sound Meta Controllers
item.description: This function introduces a number of meta controllers that affect the on-board sounds.

item.title: TNR Hardware
item.description: This page describes the TNR hardware (as much as I know).

item.title: MIDI Transport Controls
item.description: This page discusses the TNR’s baseline MIDI transport implementation, and some extensions.

item.title: XY layer type
item.description: This function adds a new 2 axis XY controller layer type.

item.title: Layer Meta Controllers
item.description: This function introduces a number of layer meta controllers : Velocity, Pan, Volume, Sound length, Chorus amount, Reverb amount.

item.title: Delayed Block Change
item.description: This function introduces delayed block changes, so that block changes only execute at the end of a bar.

item.title: Meta Controller - Send to Layer
item.description: This function introduces a “Send” meta controller, sending notes from one layer to another.

item.title: Abacus layer type
item.description: This function adds a new Abacus layer type.

item.title: Quick Layer Copy
item.description: This function adds the ability to quickly copy layers to each other.

item.title: Meta Controller - Block Change
item.description: This function introduces meta controllers, the first one of which is a block change.

item.title: Meta Controller - Master Transpose
item.description: This function introduces a master transpose meta controller.

item.title: MIDI recording
item.description: This function adds MIDI (note on) recording to all layers.

item.title: Suppress Midi SysEx (updated)
item.description: This function manages the output of MIDI SysEx messages everytime you press a button in normal mode, and CC messages when instruments are changed.

item.title: Auditioning a TNW file
item.description: This is a small utility for auditioning sample (TNW) files without having to load them to the TNR.

item.title: (Limited) User sample pitch shift
item.description: This function doesn’t allow arbitrary pitch shifting of user samples, but does open up some of the TNR’s base capability.

item.title: Meta Controller - Arpeggio 4 (Arp4)
item.description: This function introduces an implementaton of an arpeggiator.

item.title: Per layer scales (expanded)
item.description: This function adds the ability to set different scales per layer.

item.title: Tools of the trade
item.description: If you are going to be updating firmware frequently, I can recommend these…

item.title: Control Change
item.description: This function allows arbitrary CC (Midi control change) messages to be sent.

item.title: Per layer midi channels
item.description: This function adds the ability to set different midi channels per layer (including off)

item.title: TNR Power On Buttons
item.description: This page describes the behaviour of the TNR when certain buttons are held down on power up/boot.

item.title: Tenori-On : Project Introduction and Goals
item.description: The Yamaha Tenori-on, designed in collaboration between the performance artist Toshio Iwai and Yamaha, is a wonderful piece of hardware.

item.title: Animations
item.description: This change unlocks some existing animations in the TNR, and adds a few more.

item.title: Remote block change
item.description: This function adds the ability to change the block remotely, without being in remote mode.
